data.title: CAF with my favorites - Bulgarian
data.meta_description:
Fun fact about Bulgaria: In Bulgaria, you shake your head to say “yes”, and nod to say “no”! 
Bulgarian names consist of a first name, a patronymic ending in -ov or -ev for males and -ova or -eva for females, and a surna…
data.text:
Fun fact about Bulgaria: In Bulgaria, you shake your head to say “yes”, and nod to say “no”!

Bulgarian names consist of a first name, a patronymic ending in -ov or -ev for males and -ova or -eva for females, and a surname. Women typically take their husband’s surname upon marrying, but they don’t have to. Alternatively, men can choose to take their wife’s surname.

DH (57): Aleksandar Branimir Iliya Krastyo Aleksi Vasko Yosif / Damyanov Dragomirov Milenov Parvanov Marinov (Andonov, Boyanov, Dragov, Iliev, Markov)

DW (54): Anelia Iliyana Polina Ralitsa Rumena Korneliya Nedelya / Antonova Blagoyova Boykova Draganova Filipova (Andonova, Boyanova, Dragova, Ilieva, Markova)

DS (27): Andrei Danail Antoniy Ivaylo Hristiyan Serafim Timotei / father’s name + -ov

DS (25): Matey Gavrail Nikolai Radomir Stoyan Sergei Spas / father’s name + -ov

DD (21): Lalka Dafina Malina Nadezha Mihaela Yoana Zhivka / father’s name + ova

DS (27):

-DW (27): Aksinia Bisera Elisaveta Lilyana Militsa Silviya Zaharina / Natanailova Petarova Samuilova Krastyova Valkova

– DD (2): Denica Doroteya Evangeliya Ivet Rumiana Vesela Vyara / father’s name + ova

DS (25)

-DGF (24): Mariyana Stefania Stoyanka Ivayla Nevena Branimira Zoya / Ivanova Asenova Petrova Kolarova Popova (Dancheva, Mihova, Radkova, Pavlova, Staneva)

-DGF 24: [name_f]Zoya[/name_f] Ivanova Staneva

[name_m]Aleksandar[/name_m] Damyanov Andronov + [name_f]Polina[/name_f] Blagoyova Andronova
